name: Zelda Demake Majora's Mask on Game Boy - Termina Town - Made with GB Studio
name_original: Zelda Demake Majora's Mask on Game Boy - Termina Town - Made with GB Studio
description:
A demake demo of Zelda majora's mask on our old fat game boy  style 

 Made with GB Studio

With your keyboard, use arrows to move, Enter for Start and Z for any action.

There are some limits that i can't manage for the moment : 

-The sound is very complicated to make and import so I input a basic song 

-Link can not manage a sword in this version (limitation of frames) 

I added some elements and changed some parts of the original storyboard in order to adapt it at our Fat Game Boy.

In a futur version of GB Studio, I hope I will make an inventory menu

Graphics : Thanks to LARETAKE (Deviant Art Artist)

Dev : Thanks to Tononyto (myself) and the GB Studio Team

For the game solution,  see this old beta video :
